attributes.action: accept that the Lisbon treaty is now dead and to stop the ratification process at once
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that our dear brothers in Ireland who actually had a chance to vote on  the Lisbon treaty have now voted no, we should  stop our ratification process as this clearly undermines democracy and the choice of the Irish people. A choice which was denied to everyone else because we couldn't be trusted to vote correctly.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
